mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO t_invoice_plan( contractId, paymentPlanFact, versionNo, amt, planDate, planReceiveDate, receiveAmt, state, createDate, updateDate, planState ) VALUES
(#{item.contractId},#{item.paymentPlanFact},#{item.versionNo},#{item.amt},#{item.planDate},#{item.planReceiveDate},#{item.receiveAmt},#{item.state},#{item.createDate},#{item.updateDate},#{item.planState})
